values.text: 10+2 Pass from any discipline and from recognized Board with minimum 45% can also apply.

Admission starts from April every year. Classes commence from August. A Candidate who has appeared in board exams and result is awaited is eligible to apply.  A full-time degree course and course length would be of full 3 years.

Bachelor of Computer Applications is a three-year undergraduate degree course in the field of computer applications/ computer science. After BCA the students can do further studies as MCA master in computer application.

For Admission to 2nd year of MCA course (Lateral Entry), in any institution affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow, a candidate must have passed Bachelors degree course of minimum three years duration in BCA, B.Sc (Information Technology/ Computer Science) from any recognized Indian University; or its equivalent, recognized by A.I.U. securing minimum 50% (45% for SC/ST) marks in aggregate. The candidate must have passed Mathematics at 10+2 level or Graduation level.

For admission to first year of MCA in any institution affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow, a candidate must have passed Bachelors degree course of 03 Years minimum duration from any recognized Indian University; or its equivalent, recognized by A.I.U. securing minimum 50% (45% for SC/ST) marks in aggregate. Candidate must have passed Mathematics at 10+2 level or Graduation level.

values.text: FEE structure of MBA

Eligibility of the course
+ A graduate from any discipline with min 50%. Final year students awaiting results may also apply.
+ A minimum score of 500 in MAT or equivalent score in any other Entrance Exam, e.g. JCCAT/XAT/RMAT/CAT, etc.
+ Students, whose final graduation result is not yet declared, will be given provisional admission and they will have to submit the proof of passing Graduation examinations within one month after admission.
